message: Let's be fair and start with 60-40, I'm open to negotiations!
Let's split it evenly this time. A fair deal saves us from inflation.
I'll give you a bit more than before, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
I'm being more than fair, but we need to settle this soon.  The clock (and inflation!) are ticking.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle of our last offers, but I won't go lower than this.
